reviewText:
I am not at all ashamed to say that I spent a good 45 minutes reading reviews from previous customers about this swimsuit because I was so skeptical in buying it. I was going back and forth between buying this suit at a 1/4 of the price or investing in the actual Triangl suit. I thought that this would not look like the picture, that the quality would not be as high, that the fit would be off, and that it would be made of a much cheaper material than the Triangl swimsuits are. Happy to report that this is not at all the case. First, I must say that the neoprene material is thick, has a good hand, covers well, and feels expensive. The picture is exactly how the suit came-no surprises there. The only thing that I would change would be to be able to choose the size of your top and bottom instead of only choosing one size. I am about 5'6, 135 pounds and range between a 4-6, S-M. I am curvier on bottom than I am on top (usually a 34B) and ordered a size Medium. The bottoms fit perfectly which was great. A lot of times I have to size up to a Large just to get some coverage, but this was not necessary for this suit. I'm not able to fill out the top completely (also a size M), but I'll be able to make it work as it was not too noticeable or too big for my liking. Overall, I would definitely recommend this to a friend. You are saving a large amount of money and getting a suit that is almost identical to Triangl. I will invest in one of their suits one day, but was not ready to pull the trigger spending $110 with shipping.

I wanted to post this review for all the others out there that are skeptical about buying this suit. I rely heavily on customer reviews before I buy anything. I hope this helps sway your decision one way or another.
summary: Skeptical at first, but turned out great

reviewText: Beautiful neon colors, good fit
It's the right size but bikini bottom starts gaping in back when wet.

First off, when I took it out of the bag I realized that it looked like a Pokeball... or maybe cat's eyes? Somehow I didn't realize that when I ordered. However, this is the style this summer apparently. The colors are true to picture and quite vibrant which was one of the only good things. Oh the bad things... This style of swimsuit was never intended for girls with curves. You can force it to fit you but it is NOT flattering. The top smashes your chest in  and does not give you any cleavage. The bottoms are like DIAPERS - even in the model you can kind of see how they look like diapers (the photographers did their best to hide this). The sides of the bikinis are simply too thick and the back is too tight to accommodate and accentuate hips and butt. I am a 34 B, typically a 4 in pants, and have a 27 waist. I got a medium and the top smashed MY chest (and it's NOT even that big!) and the bottoms were a hot mess. I have a super curvy bottom and these bikinis sunk into it and so my bottom hung over the sides! Not cute. However, if you are a slim girl and don't need to worry about the booty, I bet this looks great on you! It is true neoprene, quite thick, and very vibrant.

reviewText: AWESOME. LOVE IT!!!!  FITS PERFECTLY!!  4-6 M  ; )

I bought this suit because I've been in love with one (that looks identical but costs about 4x as much by another brand) for months!! In fact, I had ordered the expensive version back in November, but had to cancel my order because it took so long to ship and wouldn't arrive by my vacation days. This suit definitely took a while to arrive, but was so much cheaper, and seems like a pretty nice dupe, in my opinion. The colors are super vibrant! And I haven't noticed any flaws with stitching, etc. The fabric is thick, I'm pretty sure that it is not actually neoprene, but it is much thicker and more stiff than a typical bikini suit and doesn't stretch much. The cut is flattering, however, and I was happy that it fit me, since I read a bunch of other reviews and followed the sizing quide to order accordingly. That being said, the cups on the top are not quite big enough for me. I ordered the XL, as I am a U.S. Size M/6-8 usually and a 34DD on top. The bottoms fit me wonderfully, as does the band on the top of the suit, but the actual cups fit maybe about half of my bust in them. I'm not all that surprised, and overall really impressed with the fit otherwise, as well as apparent quality.

This knock-off is great! I totally recommend it. It feels like legit neoprene. The colors are so bright and will look amazing with a tan! It's a great quality suit and I with be buying another one. (Btw, I got the royal blue one with neon yellow)

I don't know why people are saying this swimsuit runs small!! I am 5'3 and 110lbs, size 0 and a bra size of 32A-B ish. I got this suit in a small. The bottoms fit but not tightly/securely (a strong wave would have made them drop) and the top was falling off because it was so loose. I'm very disappointed because it is a total Triangl dupe and super cute. I wish it came in XS. As for the quality, it's very well made neoprene and the clasp in the back clips smoothly. 5 stars for quality, but in my opinion, the sizing is probably true to size, because I'm an XS usually and this size small swimsuit was too large for me.
summary: Why is everyone saying it runs small?!

reviewText: I LOVE THIS SUIT! It's is identical to Triangl Swimwear. I am 5'3, 120 lbs, 32 C or 34 B and I ordered a small despite all of the reviews saying to order a size up. I am so glad I ordered a small! The next size up would have been too loose! Fits like a glove. Great buy!
Loved this dupe. Fits perfect. Can't tell the difference.

Love this Ebuddy suit!! The colors are gorgeous and so vibrant (I got the deep blue). The material feels great. It fits perfectly - I am 5'3, sz 0 pants, 32D top, and the sz small in this suit was perfect. Very highly recommend!!

I ABSOLUTLY LOVE THIS SWIMSUIT!!! I have been obsessed over the triangl swimwear suits for some time now and i have been looking to find good quality suit that is similar but for less money. This suit is exactly what I wanted!  It fits perfectly and I LOVE the neon coloring. I am 32B and a size 3 pant and the small fits so well. The bottoms are a little low rise and a little cheeky, but thats ok. The straps are adjustable and the top fits very nicely and is really really comfortable. I would highly suggest this for anyone!!

Let me 1st say this, BUYER BEWARE OF WHICH SELLER THIS SUIT COMES FROM!!!! If it is not from Ebuddy, you will probably end up with a cheap looking bra and underwear polyester material bikini. I know, because this happened to me! I have even included a photo of just how big of a difference these bathing suits have from one another. The one I ordered from Ebuddy I looooove! I am 57 and 115 pounds but with a bigger chest and wider hips, and because of this I ordered a Medium. Yes, there is no padding in the Ebuddy (wetsuit version) of this bikini. However, because I have a  big chest (36C) I did not want nor did I need any padding. My tops fits great although I think it may be a little risky if one was moving around a lot. I usually wear a size 3 in pants and these bottoms fit me to perfection. Now, as for the bra and panty looking set that I received from the seller Walters Shop which AGAIN IS NOT the seller Ebuddy, this set actually has a push up cup which is exactly what you see in a push up bra. The colors do not pop and the material is totally different! It feels like regular polyester underwear with a silky finish. Certainly not made for water. The push up cup in the bra literally lifted my boobs up out of the top, total spillage! I don't understand how two sellers can claim to be selling the same item (Amazon should change this) but yet I end up with two totally different products! I knew the moment I received my Walters Shop version, that what I got was not what everyone was talking about in the other reviews. It was clear to me that this was NOT what was shown in the pictures nor what was described on the site. So I tried again and this time I made sure it was the seller matched the name of the bikini which was Ebuddy. Once this came 2days later (thanks to Amazon Prime) I knew that it was exactly what I wanted and what I was originally expecting! Check out my pics and remember to be careful when ordering! And both of these were ordered in a size Medium, but as you can see the fit is completely different!
 However, on a positive note for Walter's shop, i was refunded in full quickly!
summary: Buyers Beware of Seller Only Shop Ebuddy

In the details, there is a sizing chart according to how things will fit, which helped me pick my size of the suit.  I normally wear a small in tshirts, I'm a 34B, and about a 4 in jeans, and the medium fits me perfectly! My suit got here quickly, even with standard shipping. reviewText:
I don't usually leave reviews, but this one deserves it. Gonna try to make this short and sweet:

*SIZING - Personally, I think it fits true to size. I am a 34C/36B (Victoria secret sizing) and usually a size 4 or small in bottoms. I ordered a M based off of other reviews about ordering a size up. BUT if you look at the FEATURES AND DETAILS section, they actually tell you what measurements add up to their sizing to order from them. Based off my body measurements, I am in fact a size M for this product, which is why I put true to size in this review. It fits snugly without making it look like a sausage casing squeezing you out everywhere. I actually like that there is no padding and that the straps are adjustable too. With that said, please bear in mind that because this comes in a set, the top may fit and the bottom may not, and vice versa. I live in Miami, and although I was not blessed with curves, I have many friends who are so definitely order a size up if you do. You may have to contact the company if one piece doesn't fit, I think it was in another review that they can work something out with you. I HAVE NOT used it in water yet, so I'll update how it fits when I do, but as a laying out at the beach bathing suit, it looks perfect.

*QUALITY - for the price, you are definitely getting a steal. The colors are very vibrant and neon, which goes really well with tan skin like mine. But there a lot of color choices that are compatible with all skin tones. Because of the neoprene material, it is thick but helps make the bathing suit feel structured, especially the top piece. It stretches just enough as well as fits like a glove.

*SHIPPING - I have Amazon prime and ordered it on sat, and came promptly on Monday, as expected.

All in all, I loved how this bathing suit looked and felt that I am most likely going to be buying another one. I do yoga, swim, and boot camp as my exercises, but I don't have the most in shape body; regardless, this bathing suit made me look really good lol good luck to all who end up purchasing this, I hope you are happy with your purchase as I was :)
Top fit okay. Bottoms were a bit too big. Wish I could have ordered different sizes in the top and bottom.

I was SO nervous when I ordered this bathing suit. So often people try to buy knockoffs of a name brand and it is a complete fail. This bathing suit was nearly perfect. I ordered the orange and the colors POP. My friend has a real Triangl and in comparison they are almost identical (The real orange is not as bright and is more of a salmon color). They pretty much look and feel exactly the same. I actually prefer this brand because I really enjoy the neon orange tone it has to it. I also noticed that the clasp is secure but easy to remove when needed. I usually wear a size medium bottoms and 34 D in bra size. There's no extra padding in the top so its not a push up but I'm not complaining! Definitely get one size bigger than the bottoms you normally wear because they are a little snug. I went with a large and it fits to perfection. I've gotten it wet and its proven to be true to the feel of a wet suit and is not too thin or see-through. The only downside is that you can't order separate sizes for the top and bottom. But, all in all, this bathing suit is definitely worth the price you are paying and is very high quality!

reviewText: Great item for the price.  Very flimsy, but for $30 and a need for a quick fix, definitely did the job!

It doesn't have a slot for a hanger to stick out of the top so your clothes can be zipped up in the case while it is hanging in the closet.  (I hope that makes sense)  It is a good case, but I don't use it because I keep clothes in a garment bag while it is in my closet.

Bought this bag for travels to a wedding.  Being in the wedding, I needed to store my suit. I received the bag on time (prime), but the experience soured from there. After unpacking the bag, I put the wedding suit in it (1 jacket, 1 pair of pants, and 1 men's dress shirt). When attempting to zip the bag back up (for the first time) one of the zipper's popped off the track and into my hands completely. I was able to zip the bag up with the other zipper. When I got to my destination. I unzipped the bag and undid the velcro cover on the inside. When undoing the velcro, it ripped at the top and and began to fray. It was a hassle to use the bag for the rest of the trip and I actually ended up folding up my suit and putting into a carry on bag for the return journey. I was excited to see this on sale, but I guess it's a case of you get what you pay for. A completely unsatisfying buying experience.
Good for the money. Little disappointed there was no straps to hold clothing more securely near bottom of suit bag.

Upon very first use, zipper that keeps the bag folded in half broke off right as I was checking in for my flight. Talk about bad timing! Didn't even have the bag very full nor was I applying much force. Thing just popped right off. I'm just glad no other zippers came off during my trip but I promptly returned this for a refund upon my return. If you want decent quality, keep looking.
summary: Failed During First Use... At the Airport!

I bought this for my daughter and she absolutely loved it. The owl is very cute and while she can't read the time yet (she's five), she enjoys opening up the wings to show others what time it is. There were two minor issues though which were easy to resolve.

First, the chain broke. I don't believe this is because the chain is weak, I think my daughter is really rough. Plus she has a small neck so it hangs down very low. Secondly, the back of the owl that houses the battery fell off once while she was playing. Luckily, I was able to find it and with just a dab of super glue at the top, it snapped back in and never came back out. I can still remove it though if that's what I want to.

All in all, it was a great purchase for my daughter who continues to wear it and show it off.

reviewText: I loved it! The lwatch works perfect, I get all kind of compliments for my antique owl watch.
this watch is so cute and working well .

Updated (9/22/15) --

The watch continues to work just fine.  I receive a nice notice from Mifine asking about the watch and I told them the two minor flaws I found (see below).  They offered to send me another one!  This one has stiff wings (right a little more stiff) but it's a different feel and should work itself out fine.  This crystal is fine -- no embedded speck!  For correction of very minor issues and the watch continuing to work fine -- I have upped my "starrage" from 4 to 5!  Great watch -- very good company!

A nice simple watch!  That's all I wanted!

I cannot wear a wristwatch.  I was looking for an inexpensive pendant watch.  I found those that have the long top stems don't work so this was just what I needed - a bottom stem!

It's not perfect but the clock seems to hold time pretty well -- I've only had it a week.

The right wing does not want to extend easily.  You have to pull/push on that ear like you own it to extend out that wing.  There is a tiny white spot near the "2" that appears to be within the glass crystal itself rather than under or on top of it.  There are bubbles and blemishes in the finish of the metal both around the face of the watch and on the back.  All of this is minor as long as it tells time!

The box it came in was squashed in one corner and pink -- not blue like the picture shows.

On the plus side, the watch is water resistant and that was unexpected.  Since I don't always remember to take it off when I wash dishes, I appreciate that extra step.  I'm not worried if it gets splashed.  I don't have the sink that full to dunk it!

All in all -- it does what I want and is cute.  It's not perfect but for this price, that is not a reasonable expectation in the first place!  It's worth the price I paid so I'm happy.
summary: Does what is needed -- what more can you ask?

I bought these for my Mom for her birthday because she had been driving around town wearing her bright green gardening gloves to protect her hands from the sun. She was very excited to get these because, not only was it a thoughtful gift (pat on the back) but finding UV protective gloves that are also stylish is almost impossible.  These are super cute and they fit her... well... you know... like a glove :)
About the fit: I tried these on too.  We are both short women; I am 5' 2" and my Mom is 5' 1". Our hands are "small" as in we have short fingers, but my Mom is not a skinny lady and she had no trouble with the girth of these gloves either.

I recieved this on Monday, and was a little leery with some of the reviews I read, but needed a retainer for my snake bite lip ring for an upcoming c-section. It came super fast, and I like that there are a bunch of them just in case, but wasn't a big fan of the studs as they didn't seem as firm as my bioplast studs. Someone on one of the reviews had mentioned this wouldn't work in a bioplast labret stud if you were to just put the top of the retainer into it as normally you'd screw the top piece of the bioplast into it. However, with mine I have always had to push them in as screwing them never worked, but the top piece of the retainer seemed a bit thicker than the tops of my bioplast pieces, but decided to try it on one of my bioplast studs. I was relieved when not only did it fit perfectly, but it was sturdy and took some effort to remove, which is what I wanted, and my original top piece of my bioplast still fit perfectly in the stud afterwards. I've been wearing it ever since, and am extremely happy with the results! I feel most comfortable using my own bioplast stud, but the retainer stud would probably be just fine for a short amount of time. I wanted to keep mine in for a while though so I didn't have to worry about it just before the c-section, and could focus on the baby and not having to remove and replace my lip ring right away. It isn't very invisible however, so if you need to hide it I'd suggest using make up, and then cleaning that area really good afterwards. Mine seems a little on the shinny side, almost as if I had the diamond still in, but flat. The reason why I gave a 4 star instead of the 5 was because of the stud, however this product is absolutely wonderful and I'm very happy with it! I added a pic so you can see what it looks like on me and with my bioplast stud.
summary: Purchased for upcoming c-section, can use top of retainer with bioplast labret stud.

reviewText:
Pros: Bar is a good length. Not too snug, not too loose.
  Bioflex is very soft and comfortable.
  Far less noticeable than traditional metal jewelry.

Cons: The push in top can be very difficult to do without using a mirror.
  The push in top is not clear, but kind of a frosted white. My facial hair does a pretty good job of hiding this, but not everyone has that  option.
  Some of the push in tops have some slightly sharp edges. Can be filed down for comfort I'm sure, but it hasn't been enough of a burden for me to try.

Overall I'm pleased with the product. Would receive 5 stars if the push in end was as clear as the post it pushes into.
summary: Comfortable Alternative for Work or Play.

This product surprised me.  It's true they are still fairly visible in your ears, but compared to an actual piece of jewelry, they are very subtle.  I bought these for a business trip and they worked fine with the combination of me keeping my hair down to still hide the retainers.  I also have kept them in for about a week by now, including 3 high-intensity workouts, showering, and sleeping, and they've been very secure in my ears.  I was happy to receive 7 pcs (not sure if that was intentional) because I have exactly 6 piercings, so I was glad to have a spare in case I lost parts, so overall I am happy with this purchase.

The only real downside is that they are fairly long, which makes them still noticeable in your ears (especially for me, they were more noticeable in my industrial holes than in my conch holes due to the angling).  As another reviewer wrote, they are noticeable because they're a more white-clear than a perfect clear.  But for the price and how secure they are in your ears - and the fact that any retainers will still take up space and be somewhat visible - I'd say it's still a good product.

I had worn compression hose for a long time.  I saw these in a store and asked my doctor If I could substitute these socks for the hose,.  she said to try them and as long as my feet did not swell, they would be okay.  I have been wearing them for about a year now and just love them!  the cost difference is astounding, I was paying $30 a pair for the compression hose and I get 2 pairs of the socks for just $12.99 (they last a lot longer too).  I would recommend them to anyone with circulatory problems, but I would discuss it with your doctor first,
I buy these socks  for my mother who is diabetic and she loves them. They stay up well without cutting off circulation and are very comfortable.  Will buy her more as she needs them.

reviewText: I returned a pair of shoes that were too small. I was sent these shoes, however they are yet to arrive. I would like to have these shoes. My son already started school he is the only one of my kids that went to school on his first day in his old shoes. I'm sure he will be fine, but it really stinks that they are not here. What do we do next?

These shoes run REALLY narrow!  So while the length was just OK for size 13 boy, they squeezed at the widest part of his foot (between arch and toes).  This has never been an issue with other shoes and he fits in his other size 13 shoes with no issues, so this seems to be a direct problem with this shoe.  I compared them bottom to bottom with his other regular size 13 shoes and they are at least 1/4" more narrow and even more so at the toe.  These are very very stiff as well - like having a plank under your foot.  No bend at all as you walk.  I wanted to send back but seller (DC Shoes) is making us pay return shipping fees despite item being clearly labeled FREE RETURNS.  AND they want it shipped insured or with some other form of proof of delivery.  Meaning I'm going to lose half the cost of the shoe just sending it back.  (when I complained they said I'm very welcome to take it to a DC store to return it instead.  How VERY generous of them!  Sheesh)  VERY VERY unhappy with this whole experience.  Not at all what my previous history with Amazon and marketplace purchases has been like.
summary: READ FIRST!  These are cute, but for narrow feet.

If I could give DC shoes a zero stars I would. I was searching the Internet for shoes and stumbled across DC shoes. I noticed that they had shoes from .99 to $60. I decide to look to see what they had at the .99 price. You would think nothing but it was worth a shot right. I found about 6 pairs (I have 4 sons) and was really excited. I placed my order and was excited that I got shoes for my boys for super cheap. It is hard to provide clothing and shoes for 4 boys and stay on budget. Well I soon received a message from DC stating that it was a pricing error and they would not be honoring my order. How is this fair to the customer? These were the prices placed on multiple products not just one but multiple and multiple sizes so how is it a mistake? So now I have to figure out a way to get 4 pairs of shoes for cheap. DC shoes should be ashamed of themselves. Do not penalize the customer because you guys made a mistake.

reviewText: I absolutely LOVE these shoes! I bought my 2 1/2 identical twin boys each a pair. I dress them alike often, so I try to get them shoes that are different colors. I try to get the one red and the other green shoes, or with a little of those colors. It makes it easier for daycare and others to tell them apart....and for me as well! Anyways, these DC shoes are so adorable, and the price was decent as well. They do fit a little larger than expected. I bought another pair of shoes, lacoste, at the same time and the same size, and they fit my boys pretty well, maybe a little big, but they still were able to wear them. These shoes, which I ordered in a size 7, were too big for my twins to wear. I tried to have them wear them to daycare one day, but later realized that they were just too big. That's ok though, b/c of course they will grow into them. I undid the shoestrings to tie them for the boys to make them tighter, and now I don't know how to get them laced the way they came! lol I'm sure by this spring they will be fitting better, and my boys will be able to get into them. They are very high quality for toddler's shoes, and I am happy with this purchase.

My kid loves these shoes.  They haven't lasted very long, but any parent who has a skateboarder knows that skateboarding limits the life of shins, shoes, and laces.  He skateboards 3-8 hours per day during the summer, so these poor shoes have taken a beaten.  We've replaced the laces, but will absolutely get a new pair of this same kind as soon as these ones are done.  They've been on his feet everyday since we bought them in April or May.
summary: Great shoes, my kid loves them.

reviewText: My son wanted a pair of green shoes like Oscar on the "Odd Squad" PBS show.  As he grows out of his shoes every six months or so, we decided to get something a LITTLE bigger than what he is currently wearing.  We got our best option on the the third attempt.  I ordered the first pair a half size bigger than the shoes he's wearing now and they were about a full size size smaller than what I was expecting.  I returned that first pair and reordered a pair a full size larger than the ones he's wearing (I thought the first pair might have been a fluke and smaller than "normal")  .When they came they were just about the same size he was wearing but "a little tight" according to my son.  SO, those went back too and I went with what I think should be two sizes bigger than what he is wearing now.  They are just a little big for him but that's what I was going for.  The last pair I purchased was "1 M US Little Kid" and he typically wears a 12 in kids size.  Truth be told I don't really understand the children's shoe sizes . . . 5 thru 10 toddler, then 10.5 thru 13.5 little kid then it "jumps" to 1 thru 3 little kid and finally 3.5 thru 7 big kid?  The bottom line, a full size bigger than his current size was a little tight so we went with two full sizes bigger to get a shoe that fits "a little big".  He just got them so I can't say much about durability.  The colors available are great and he loves the green.  The price was reasonable for a pair of shoes my son will wear for about six months before he grows out of them.  I marked down a star only because of the sizing issues.
summary: Order up at least a size and a half . . .

These were bought for my 18 year old daughter who works as a lifeguard. Her job requires that she wears sunglasses and they must be polarized. She likes these Aviator glasses a lot!

Pros
-they fit her face perfectly (she is 5'2" and 100 lbs)
-finish is great, good quality controls
-polarized lens
-comes in a zippered case in a Ray Ban box
-comes with warranty card
-AUTHENTIC RAY BAN SUNGLASSES
(They are NOT fake knock off sunglasses)

Cons
-expensive.....but you get what you pay for!

I do recommend if you are looking for real authentic Aviator Ray Ban sunglasses!

CPS

I read a lot of reviews here about these sunglasses, a lot of girls using it. First of all, yes they are beautiful and fit pretty well at my face, Therefore I can say that they are very nice not only for woman, but also for man. Yes, this product is original, glass, polarized lens, it is a true Ray Ban. It is well worth the price. The only thing that prevented me to give 5 stars is that because of the mirror glasses you can have a little vision discomfort when there is light behind, some people wrote about this before me. And any finger marks, no matter how small, leave an impress that the sunglasses has to be cleaned.
summary: yes they are beautiful and fit pretty well at my face

reviewText: Looks great, fits great...turns fingers green 3 days after wear.  Buyer beware. Looks great though, sitting in your jewelry dish because you can't wear it anymore due to tarnishing.

This ring is exactly what I was looking for. I wanted a cute, cheap ring with a little sparkle for everyday wear. Overall, I'm pretty happy with the ring with just a few notes.
- I'd say the center CZ and halo look a little bigger in pictures than it does it person. That worked out fine for me because I was actually a little worried that it'd be too overwhelming for my small fingers. The difference is barely noticeable though and could probably just be chalked up to the slight difference between real life and on screen images.
- The band is very thin. I don't know if it's particularly weak because it didn't get banged around during delivery and I haven't tried to dent it, but I know some people hate the way thin bands look. For reference, I looked around for things about the same thickness to give a good idea and I'd say it's a little wider/thicker than a bobby pin. Not the thickness of the whole thing, but like if you straightened it at its bend and tried to wrap it around your finger.
- It runs a little small but that might also be because of how thin the band is. I wear an 8 and it goes on smoothly enough, but not as smooth as my other rings with a wider band. Band is very thin, making it very comfortable to wear.  Rose gold plating is beautiful - I was afraid it would look too copper-y, but it's a lovely color.  CZ stones are crystal clear, appear to have a slight blue-ish tint (maybe that's because of the gold), and brilliant sparkle.  As a whole, the ring is dainty but stunning.  My only complaint is that a wedding band will NOT sit flush against it.  Other than that, I absolutely LOVE this ring!  Hope my review helped!

reviewText:
I bought this as a fun replacement for my real engagement ring while I'm losing weight and don't want to have to resize multiple times. I made the mistake of not immediately painting the inside of the ring with clear nail polish, like normal. I do have really sensitive skin. It's a little bit flashy compared to my real engagement ring, but it's really fun. I can't speak to the sizing because I don't know my real size, so I took a guess, compared to my old size.
I probably won't wear it every day when I go out, since I ordered a nice eternity band for daily wear, but all girls like to have fun with flashy jewelry! And, I'm not an expert or anything, but it looks real to me. (As long as you don't turn it over and look at the scratches. It does scratch very easily, so I'm hoping my new coat of nail polish, which I will apply regularly will stop that).
Overall, you may want nail polish on it to prevent scratching and green skin, if you have sensitive skin.
summary: You May Want to Put Some Nail Polish on It

reviewText: Really nice ring, very sparkly.
Decent for the price. Would recommend. Arrived quick. Wife likes it,
Very Pretty! Love it!

To be honest, I was a little nervous when I finally received my ring! It took about 15 business days to arrive. Once I finally opened the little box it came in, I was immediately impressed, the stones are very clear with a lot of sparkle, the main stone is not so large that it looks fake, and the rose gold is just gorgeous. The band is thin, which I love! I ordered a 7, and I usually am about a 7.5, and it fits perfectly; finally a ring that I can wear without having to buy an additional piece to be able to wear it tightly on my finger. The ring feels so light when I wear it, I almost forget I am wearing it! It is truly a stunning piece of jewelry, and I am looking forward to having it for a very long time. It almost feels like such a steal for the high quality this ring presents. If I have any changes happen with the ring, for example, if the rose gold plating chips, or if one of the stones fall out; I will be sure to update my review. When I wear the ring, it looks just perfect; not fake, and gaudy like a lot of CZ rings tend to be. My husband loves this ring too, he wanted me to find something I really wanted, since I refuse to drop thousands of dollars on a ring, and I am so glad I came across this ring, it is the perfect fit, and the exact style I have always wanted....without the thousands of dollars needing to be spent to acquire it.  I hope my review helps in the decision making, because at first when I began my searching, I kept seeing this ring pop up in the suggestions pages on here, and I am glad I ended up going with my gut on this one. These photos do not do this ring justice, it is just so gorgeous in person. I just wish the shipping didn't take so long, that's really the only downside. To be safe, I do take my ring off when I wash my hands, or do any kind of house work, and I will also remove it when I bathe....I just am too paranoid to damage this beautiful ring in any way! I highly recommend this ring for anyone that is tired of the boring wedding rings out there, and those that are like me that refuse to drop thousands of dollars on a diamond, when in actuality, CZ, in my opinion, is way more gorgeous and affordable than a diamond will ever be! <3 :-)
summary: The most beautiful ring I've ever purchased!
